title: Global Day of Code Retreat - San Diego, USA
description:
Come spend the Global Day of Code with Pluralsight in Downtown San Diego, CA at this free event.
 
 All levels are welcome!  We code the same exercise several different ways.
 
 Meals provided 
   Continental Breakfast 
   Lunch - Italian
 
 * We are on the 18th floor; You will have to check-in with Security.  
   
 PARKING INFO: 
    
    $20 parking is available in the Symphony Towers Parking Garage (operated by ABM Parking) for evening/matinee events. Enter this garage from northbound 7th Avenue. Rates are subject to change without notice for all non-symphonic events.
 
 ** B St will be closed for construction but parking can be accessed from 7th St. 
    
   
  


Come spend the Global Day of Code with Pluralsight in Downtown San Diego, CA at this free event.

 $20 parking is available in the Symphony Towers Parking Garage (operated by ABM Parking) for evening/matinee events. Enter this garage from northbound 7th Avenue. Rates are subject to change without notice for all non-symphonic events.
 
 ** B St will be closed for construction but parking can be accessed from 7th St. 

I hope this code retreat will be about coding an exercise several different ways. The last code retreat I attended was about Conway's game of life, but no one (with the exception of one angry guy in the corner was allowed to code anything but unit tests. Truth in advertising!
